climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: EWG VERIFIED: clean ingredients and full transparency
INGREDIENTS OF NATURAL ORIGIN : Formulated with 99.5% naturally sourced ingredients* including baking soda to combat unwanted odors
GOOD FOR THE PLANET : Biodegradable packaging made from FSC-certified cardboard
body.description: Super Leaves™ solid deodorant – lemon leaves is formulated with 99.5% naturally sourced ingredients* including baking soda to combat unwanted odors. Aluminum-free, it’s enriched with arrowroot powder and corn starch for improved absorption so you can stay fresh all day. It also contains invigorating lemon leaves extract. EWG VERIFIED™ and dermatologically tested, this essential vegan deodorant has a creamy formula that applies smoothly and a gentle apple fragrance with refreshing cucumber and Earl Grey notes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sustainable and Effective: 🍃🍊The Orange 🍃Scented Solution for Underarm Odor
reviews.reviewText: 🍊The aroma of the orange is absolutely amazing! 🤩 It is an energizing scent that instantly refreshes your underarm. The fresh, fruity fragrance is not only pleasant but also has long-lasting staying power, leaving a delightful smell 🍊🍃It applies smoothly and effortlessly, thanks to its creamy texture.⭐️Not only is it environmentally friendly, made from responsibly sourced ingredients, but it's also highly effective in providing the best odor protection out there.⭐️🍊🍃🫶✌️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the scent and the packaging, and the effect lasts
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an alternative to all of the stick deodorants packaged in plastic, so I tried this one. I feel better about not adding to all of the plastic that is just dumped in the landfill. I wasn't sure about the orange scent at first (I was looking something to deal with masculine body odor), but the scent has worked out well. And I am actually pleasantly surprised that it seems to last longer than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the only deodorant that has continued working for me but there are definitely cons. Smells amazing but you will definitely have residue on your armpit because it goes on very thick and white. Can get clumpy! Also comes in a cardboard package which is environmentally great but becomes difficult to put the lid back on. Also hard to use without putting fingers inside to keep it to the surface as it’s built like a push pop and with light application will go back in the tube.Though the cons are annoying, product itself is amazing. I eventually plan to buy several, empty them into a new container and use something else for application like a face tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good but different
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried switching to non-toxic grooming products so it’s been trial and error. This deodorant doesn’t need a lot of application, little goes a long way! (At first I put too much on and it had a slimy consistency, so I was put off). Smells good and neutralized the smell completely after 24 hours :) I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality product. Expensive.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the way this product works. There is no but. However, it’s very expensive and the package is not only small but you lose another half inch to 3/4 of an inch inside of the package which you don’t even realize you’re not getting the full amount. It seems a little deceptive. It only lasted four weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Really liked it the first week
reviews.reviewText: Somehow works better than traditional brands despite the lack of toxic ingredients. The scent is great too!Update: So this worked great the first week and now it's hardly working at all. The cardboard tube is annoying, the lid is small and there's a lot of wasted deodorant from it scraping off as I'm putting the lid on. I have to wash every eight hours or so because it just stopped working entirely, like every other natural deodorant I've tried. From what I understand it takes the body a little over a month to get used to not having aluminum on the skin, so I'll just have to continue constantly washing and see if it starts working better eventually. Really frustrating process and I don't recommend trying this for the first time in the middle of summer. I'm in air conditioning all day and it's still problematic.Second update: OK, so after a month things have normalized and it's working about as well as any other deodorant. Thank goodness. I will repurchase this again and continue to use it.Third update: Had to discontinue use. Caused a weird very dark line on my armpit that won't go away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Tea Leaves Attitude deodorant and I did not care for the scent. I used it anyway, and it worked fine. But, it leaves white deodorant marks on your pits, so watch out. The tube itself is made of cardboard, which is great. But, there is no dial to keep the stick up while applying. So it's a little bit of a pain to apply. Finally, it did not last long because the stick is not completely solid so it crumbles a bit when you use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love Attiitude. The deodorant smells amazing, works really well and best of all is free of crazy harsh chemicals with the company also environmentally responsible! Love them!!!

For me, I like it because it keeps me from smelling. However it is different from regular deodorant in that the packaging requires you to push the stick up through the tube, and since it's cardboard you need to hold it there to keep it from sliding back down when you apply. Also, because it softens with body heat when you apply, when you put the lid back on it will squish the overflow down creating flaky bits which fall out of the tube. Also, because it's sort of a paste stick you're applying, you need to dab and pat and smooth this on your skin. It may leave white on your clothes. If these are things that would irritate you, then this is not the deodorant for you. If you're okay with these things, then I would recommend it. I like how the formula (1) keeps the stink away, and (2) after smoothed onto the skin dries in a thin layer with a matte finish. Compared to other natural deodorants that actually work, this is a pretty decent price at $8.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: It crumbles and falls apart when trying to use
reviews.reviewText: It crumbles just as another person has mentioned with pictures. Exactly the same. It is impossible to use! Sure, it smells nice and is made of non-toxic ingredients but if that is the result of it then I'm not sure how is it in the market if it just falls apart when trying to use.

Bisher war ich mit dem Creme-Deo von Attitude immer sehr zufrieden. Allerdings ist die letzte Lieferung nicht tragbar! Das Deo bröselt, läst sich nicht auftragen und kann nur noch in den Abfalleimer wandern.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smells great, works great, feels great
reviews.reviewText: I have tried a lot of natural deodorants over the years. Many don’t work, some even make me smell worse. This one is a winner. It smells awesome all day and goes on smoothly. It is solid and doesn’t crumble, like my other effective deodorant (Schmidt).There are some cons, but for me, they aren’t a deal breaker. It does leave a white residue on dark clothes (so far, only if I put my deodorant on before putting on my shirt) and the packaging is rather annoying. I like the premise of the packaging, but the deodorant doesn’t stay up and I have to perform a juggling act to push up the tube, while putting on deodorant. I do think that the company should address this issue.Update: I've been using for several months now and this is the best deodorant. The other day, I showered on a Friday and went to winter camp (cottage). It was freezing, so I didn’t really want to remove any clothes to clean up. Come Monday morning, I was back home and thankful to shower. I never reapplied my deodorant all weekend, but still smelled great. I was utterly shocked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, the cream wasn't creamy enough and just crumbled in contact with my skin. It would not adhere to my skin and instead crumbled and fell all over the carpet. In addition the cream was so dry and packed so tightly that I found it incredibly difficult to push up.I hate leaving negative reviews, but apparently the returns policy states that I can not return them, so I don't want anyone else to waste their money. I bought two and cannot use either of them.
